title: Riot Should Place a Na server in the Caribbean
body: Should Riot Place a NA server in the Caribbean? since we all get 130 ping+ it would be very nice and have a game play.

replies.body: Lol. It's called the NA server for a reason. I cant tell if you are serious or a troll. Plus, u can just play on the LAN/LAS server for better ping.

only problem is then you're playing with the people south of the caribbean the most and they are mostly spanish speakers while other than cuba and Dominican republic/Haiti everyone speaks english. Though tbh we don't need a caribbean server we just need NA east to get their exclusive server. After chicargo move that already ensured i got around 75 ping. However recently the ping has been on the rise, was 100, now its back to 120-130 like the server moved back west.
Not everyone In the caribbean speaks english, so if there was a small NA server in the caribbean just for us to get around 50 ping it would be great.
